title: evarani vEDanu
sahitya:
evarani vEDanu evarani pogaDanu bhuvana rakSaka rAma ninnu vinA nEnu


anupallavi

  avanijA saumitri bharata shatrughna pavanaja vibhISaNAdi vinuta sucartira


caraNam    sAmaja rAjuni dhruvuni prahlAduni prEmajEsi nIvE brOvalEdA munu
shyAmasundara gAtra sarasijadaLa nEtra kAmita phalada shrI para vAsudEva ne-
